channel.title: Cape is still a weapon even if i put it in public static init capes
channel.description:
okay i just got myself a new server base project czar with and ran it with the new CSK client by swat i copied and pasted all the stuff on item.java so my dragon boots skill capes and 3rd age etc will be considered cape hat weapon etc i put it in there in item.java but when i put them all in all the item IDS there still all weapons i put them in the proper places and its still a static weapon
please help this is really annoying thanks
